page.title: 11SHOPPING IN WHITEHAVEN.
page.content: Any article that a person may need can be bought in Whitehaven.There are chain stores as well as the smaller family founded shops. Many people think that the car parking facilities are inadequate & those that are there are too expensive.Although many items bought in local shops are dearer than in larger shops further afield,they are situated close enough to the denser populated areas to be convenient. Until the recent opening of Presto the Co_op was the largest supermarket in Whitehaven.As well as foodstuffs the Co_op sells household goods,toys & clothes.140 people are employed at the Co_op.R.D.C Longridge of Preston is the main supplier of goods. A bright,airy cafe is an ideal place for housewives to rest and chat between selecting and paying for their purchases.
